main event: An observation of a ball of fire moving and disappearing over a hill followed by a fire incident.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a brief duration of 5-10 seconds,The observation was made on February 23, 1954,The location of the sighting was Price, Pennsylvania,The report suggested it could be a possible meteor sighting,Details indicate a fire started after the object disappeared.
witness description: Source ONE, no specific witness details provided.
